means: （显示器或电视机图像的）像素

sentence.Network_en: This program enabled users to draw pixel - by - pixel on the computer screen.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个界面完全模态化的程序,这个程序能让用户在计算机屏幕上逐个像素地绘画.

sentence.Network_en: Regardless of the shape the cursor assumes, it always has a single hotspot pixel.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论光标的形状如何, 它都有一个热点像素.

sentence.Network_en: Unit - mm three - dimensional coordinates and image coordinates are pixel units.
sentence.Network_cn: 三维坐标股毫米和图像坐标单位是像素.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1960s: abbreviation of picture element (compare with pix)

encyclopedia.content: pixel名词解释 1：pixel 图素、像素 像素 2：品色科技有限公司的品牌简称 品色（pixel）介绍 Pixel（品色） 企业有限公司是专业摄影器材附件制造商，公司将技术领先、品质领先为发展目标。拥有完整的研发、设计、生产体系。研发能力、制造技术、产品质量均超越同类制造商，为国内外客户群制造出更方便、更高端的摄影附件。 产品主要用于佳能、尼康、索尼、宾得、奥林巴斯、松下、三星、徕卡等国际知名品牌单反照相机，包括影楼、

entry.def: A pixel is the smallest area on a computer screen which can be given a separate colour by the computer.

means.word_mean: 1. (computer science) the smallest discrete component of an image or picture on a CRT screen (usually a colored dot);

sentences.sentence: "the greater the number of pixels per inch the greater the resolution"
